cm_to_date <- function(x) {
  x_int <- as.integer(x)
  if_else(
    is.na(x_int) | x_int > 9000 | x_int == 0,
    NA,
    ym(paste0(
      floor((x_int - 1) / 12) + 1900,
      factor(
        x_int %% 12,
        levels = 0:11,
        labels = c('Dec', 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov')
      )
    ))
  )
}

data_fem <- bind_rows(
  select(
    raw_fem_2013_2015,
    CASEID, SEST, SECU,
    AGER,
    HISPRACE2
  ),
  select(
    raw_fem_2011_2013,
    CASEID, SEST, SECU,
    AGER,
    HISPRACE2
  )
) |>
  mutate(
    one = 1,
    age_group = cut(
      AGER,
      breaks = c(14, 19, 24, 29, 34, 39, 44, 50),
      labels = c('15-19', '20-24', '25-29', '30-34', '35-39', '40-44', '45-49')
    ),
    HISPRACE2 = as_factor(labelled(HISPRACE2, c(
      'Hispanic' = 1,
      'Non-Hispanic White' = 2,
      'Non-Hispanic Black' = 3,
      'Non-Hispanic Other' = 4
    )))
  ) |>
  left_join(
    select(weights_2011_2019, CASEID, WGT2011_2015),
    by = join_by(CASEID)
  ) |>
  mutate(
    poststrat_age_race = factor(gsub(
      '[ -]',
      '_',
      paste(
        'Age',
        age_group,
        case_when(
          grepl('^Hispanic', HISPRACE2) ~ 'Hispanic',
          grepl('Black', HISPRACE2) ~ 'Non-Hispanic Black',
          .default = 'Non-Hispanic Non-Black'
        ),
        sep = '_'
      )
    ))
  ) |>
  left_join(
    data_preg |>
      group_by(CASEID) |>
      summarize(
        abortion_2006_2010_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 2006:2010 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 2006:2010 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 2006:2010 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 2006:2010 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 2006:2010 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 2006:2010 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        abortion_2006plus_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year > 2006 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year > 2006 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year > 2006 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year > 2006 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year > 2006 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year > 2006 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2006_marital_status =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & FMAROUT5 == 'MARRIED') ~ 'Married',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006) ~ 'Unmarried',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2007_marital_status =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & FMAROUT5 == 'MARRIED') ~ 'Married',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007) ~ 'Unmarried',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2008_marital_status =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & FMAROUT5 == 'MARRIED') ~ 'Married',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008) ~ 'Unmarried',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2009_marital_status =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & FMAROUT5 == 'MARRIED') ~ 'Married',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009) ~ 'Unmarried',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2010_marital_status =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & FMAROUT5 == 'MARRIED') ~ 'Married',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010) ~ 'Unmarried',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2006_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2006 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2007_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2007 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2008_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2008 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2009_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2009 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_2010_age =  case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & AGEPREG < 20) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & AGEPREG <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & AGEPREG <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & AGEPREG <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & AGEPREG <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 2010 & AGEPREG >= 40) ~ '40 years and over',
          .default = 'Other'
        )
      ),
    by = 'CASEID'
  ) |>
  mutate(
    across(
      ends_with('_age'),
      function(x) {
        factor(
          coalesce(x, 'Other'),
          levels = c(
            'Under 20 years',
            '20-24 years',
            '25-29 years',
            '30-34 years',
            '35-39 years',
            '40 years and over',
            'Other'
          ),
          order = TRUE
        )
      }
    ),
    across(
      ends_with('_marital_status'),
      function(x) {
        factor(
          coalesce(x, 'Other'),
          ordered = TRUE,
          levels = c(
            'Married',
            'Unmarried',
            'Other'
          )
        )
      }
    ),
    abortion_2006plus_age = if_else(
      abortion_2006plus_age != abortion_2006_2010_age & abortion_2006_2010_age != 'Other',
      abortion_2006_2010_age,
      abortion_2006plus_age
    )
  )

before_fem <- data_fem |>
  as_survey_design(
    strata = SEST,
    ids = SECU,
    weights = WGT2011_2015,
    nest = TRUE
  ) |>
  as_survey_rep(
    type = 'JKn'
  )

### Creation of Post-Stratification Targets

```{r create-post-stratification-targets}
census_pop_targets <- readRDS(
  here('data/Census/prepared/census_for_2011_2015.Rds')
) |>
  filter(SEX_f == 'Female') |>
  mutate(
    poststrat_age_race = gsub(
      '[ -]',
      '_',
      paste0(
        gsub(' to | years', '_', AGEGROUP_f),
        race_ethn_f
      )
    )
  ) |>
  rename(Freq = pop) |>
  select(poststrat_age_race, Freq) |>
  as.data.frame()


census_pop_total <- sum(census_pop_targets$Freq)


guttmacher_APC_national <- read_csv(
    here('data/Guttmacher/NationalAndStatePregnancy_PublicUse.csv'),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ) |>
  filter(state == 'US') |>
  mutate(interpolated = year %in%
      c(1983, 1986, 1989, 1990, 1993, 1994, 1997, 1998, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2006,
        2009, 2012, 2015)
  ) |>
  select('year', 'interpolated', 'abortionslt20', 'abortions2024',
    'abortions2529', 'abortions3034', 'abortions3539', 'abortions40plus',
    'abortionstotal')

guttmacher_APC_age <- guttmacher_APC_national |>
  filter(year %in% 2006:2010) |>
  rename(
    `Other` = abortionstotal,
    `Under 20 years` = abortionslt20,
    `20-24 years` = abortions2024,
    `25-29 years` = abortions2529,
    `30-34 years` = abortions3034,
    `35-39 years` = abortions3539,
    `40 years and over` = abortions40plus
  ) |>
  summarize(across(3:9, sum)) |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),
    names_to = 'Levels',
    values_to = 'Freq'
  ) |>
  mutate(
    abortion_2006_2010_age = factor(
      Levels,
      levels = c(
        'Under 20 years',
        '20-24 years',
        '25-29 years',
        '30-34 years',
        '35-39 years',
        '40 years and over',
        'Other'
      ),
      ordered = TRUE
    ),
    Freq = if_else(
      abortion_2006_2010_age == 'Other',
      census_pop_total - Freq,
      Freq
    )
  ) |>
  arrange(abortion_2006_2010_age) |>
  select(abortion_2006_2010_age, Freq)


NVSS_age <- bind_rows(
  read_tsv(
    here('data/NVSS/2006-2010/age.txt'),
    name_repair = 'universal',
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ),
  read_tsv(
    here('data/NVSS/2006-2010/age_2006.txt'),
    name_repair = 'universal',
    show_col_types = FALSE
  )
) |>
  filter(!is.na(Year) | !is.na(Age.of.Mother.9)) |>
  mutate(
    Variable = paste0('birth_', Year, '_age'),
    Level = factor(
      case_when(
        Age.of.Mother.9.Code %in% c('15', '15-19') ~ 'Under 20 years',
        Age.of.Mother.9.Code %in% c('40-44', '45-49', '50+') ~ '40 years and over',
        is.na(Age.of.Mother.9.Code) ~ 'Other',
        .default = Age.of.Mother.9
      ),
      levels = c(
        'Under 20 years',
        '20-24 years',
        '25-29 years',
        '30-34 years',
        '35-39 years',
        '40 years and over',
        'Other'
      ),
      ordered = TRUE
    ),
    Freq = if_else(
      !is.na(Notes) & Notes == 'Total',
      census_pop_total - Births,
      Births
    )
  ) |>
  group_by(Variable, Level) |>
  summarize(Freq = sum(Freq), .groups = 'drop') |>
  arrange(Variable, Level) |>
  group_by(Variable) |>
  group_split() |>
  lapply(function(tbl) {
    variable_name <- first(pull(tbl, Variable))
    tbl <- select(tbl, -Variable)
    names(tbl) <- c(variable_name, 'Freq')
    tbl
  })


NVSS_marital_status <- read_tsv(
    here('data/NVSS/2006-2010/marital_status.txt'),
    name_repair = 'universal',
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ) |>
  filter(!is.na(Year) | !is.na(Marital.Status)) |>
  mutate(
    Variable = paste0('birth_', Year, '_marital_status'),
    Level = factor(
      if_else(
        !is.na(Marital.Status),
        Marital.Status,
        'Other'
      ),
      levels = c(
        'Married',
        'Unmarried',
        'Other'
      ),
      ordered = TRUE
    ),
    Freq = if_else(
      !is.na(Notes) & Notes == 'Total',
      census_pop_total - Births,
      Births
    )
  ) |>
  select(Variable, Level, Freq) |>
  group_by(Variable) |>
  group_split() |>
  lapply(function(tbl) {
    variable_name <- first(pull(tbl, Variable))
    tbl <- select(tbl, -Variable)
    names(tbl) <- c(variable_name, 'Freq')
    tbl
  })


poststrat_targets <- c(
  list(census_pop_targets),
  NVSS_age,
  NVSS_marital_status,
  list(guttmacher_APC_age)
)
```


### Post-Stratifications

```{r rake-post-stratifications, dependson=c("data-preparation", "create-post-stratification-targets")}
source(here('R/rake2.R'))

weight_adj_strata_2015_2019 <- list()
weight_adj_strata_2015_2019[[12]] <- ~abortion_2006plus_age

post_fem <- rake2(
  before_fem,
  sample.margins = lapply(
    poststrat_targets,
    \(x) as.formula(paste0('~', colnames(x)[1]))
  ),
  population.margins = poststrat_targets,
  weight_adj_strata = weight_adj_strata,
  control=list(maxit=25, epsilon=1, verbose=TRUE)
)
```
